item.title: Fly tipping dumped in car park, 6th July
item.description:
People have been dumping all kinds of things in the corner of the carrot street car park. It ranges from Furniture to Southwark council bins right through to gas canisters. Please see to this issue as it is a hazard to the residents that live here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 182, Sumner Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant dog fouling, 6th July
item.description:
The alleyway between monmouth close and porthkerry ave is constantly dog abused, this is the same person who used to use green bags for poo now uses black bags there are three bags of poo, over the past four weeks this has built up and is constant, l have reported this several times , why dont you put signs up saying fouling walkways will be a fine , put in a dog poo bin, do something its getting worse plus glass bottles have appeared and rubbish put a bin in or signs
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porthkerry Avenue, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bench moved from its original position, 6th July
item.description:
The bench has been moved and is now not secured to the ground. This is very dangerous as children are constantly playing in this playground and that bench not fitted properly can lead to falling on some innocent children. Check CCTV to see who did it!!!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hindhead Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inside the garden and outside the gate, 6th July
item.description:
Sorry This garden a lot dogs they shut on the floor inside the garden and outside the garden the come outside the gate and make every where smell dongrosr and dirty for everyone and me this very crazy people can you speak with police about this bad smell people I don't know how every where this people they are very dongrosr for me they can kill anyone Thanks

item.title: Unlawfully designed box junction, 6th July
item.description:
The box junction expands over the whole junction when it should only cover the area where the is crossing traffic, not where traffic joins from the side road onto the main road. This causes confusion of who has priority. This box junction is also camera controlled

Report on FixMyStreet
